item.title: A Layman’s Guide to Computer Vision
item.description: I discovered this interesting study on arXiv about metalearning. It’s a fascinating glimpse into the future of machine learning and while I had been expecting this for a while, to finally see some solid research is amazing! The researchers evolve a bunch of convolutional neural networks using a genetic algorithm to create an optimal network for image classification. To understand what the heck I’m talking about, read on! A bunch of animals.
